official_title: A concurrent resolution condemning the use of plastic or rubber bullets by British security forces in Northern Ireland and calling upon the Government of the United Kingdom to end the use of such bullets against civilians.

summary.text: Condemns the use of plastic or rubber bullets by British security forces in Northern Ireland. Calls upon the Government of the United Kingdom to end the use of such bullets against civilians.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution condemning the use of plastic or rubber bullets by British security forces in Northern Ireland and calling upon the Government of the United Kingdom to end the use of such bullets against civilians.
